objects.text:
• Ever-soft and ever-snug grip
• Roomy toe box for comfort
• SpaceWalk 3-layered sole system
• Light, airy, and cloud-like feel

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
The banner design features a clean and modern aesthetic with a warm, beige-toned background divided into two sections using soft contrast. A large, bold text element (id: "heading") sits prominently at the top left, paired with a stylish subheading (id: "subheading") just below it. A concise bullet list (id: "description") highlights product features in a clear format. The product image (id: "product_image") is placed slightly tilted for dynamic visual impact on the right. Below, the price (id: "price") stands out in thick, bold text, next to a call-to-action button (ids: "cta_background" and "cta"). Decorative background elements such as lines and translucent circles add depth and structure.

Color Palette:
- Cream Beige: #F2EDE4
- Light Taupe: #E6DFD4
- Rich Mocha: #724830
- Coffee Brown: #9A7B63
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish sneaker with a minimalistic and earthy color palette, ideal for a clean and refined advertisement banner. The dominant color is a warm cream beige (#F5F0E6), covering the upper canvas and providing a neutral base. Accents of deep brown (#6B4A2F) are used for the shoelaces, inner lining, and outsole, adding contrast and grounding the design. A soft taupe (#D8CFC4) midsole subtly bridges the upper and sole. The white star logo (#FFFFFF) outlined in brown ensures brand visibility while maintaining visual harmony. Together, these colors blend smoothly while highlighting individual components for a balanced look.
